title: New Champ, Leader of Minions
body: Their should be a new champ like a leader of the minions.

replies.body: nah that would be too op. You know how much minions hurt xD

> [{quoted}](name=iAkeno,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=HOMxGzaY,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-10T03:47:20.533+0000)
>
> nah that would be too op. You know how much minions hurt xD

Haha yea. That moment when theres a huge minion wave and you can't click on he enemy champ in the middle...(yea ik you were joking but I'm serious...xD)
Like all his abilities are passives that just buff allies and minions? His ult could also turn him into a SUPER leader MINION
So its basically a Champion that makes minions more stronger... That sound rather interesting actually can't wait till we get baron and give siege minion banner of command.
they should add in like a ninja minion :3
